channel.title: [REQUEST]a little help plz
channel.description:
ok i need help with 2 things
1. i need a tutorial for how to easly add global objects..i wanna make a arena 3x3 arena and if they say like ::pk they telle into the middle of it :p
2.need a tutorial for if anyone knows..how to make a certain area.. lets say..x 3242 till x3244 to y 4244 y 3232..
thats it TYVM

item.title: [REQUEST]a little help plz
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

guku116:

where’s a place where i can find all the global object id’s… i just need something… where ppl cant walk trough.; something that stands…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 13, 2007, 10:55:42 AM[/size][hr]GUYZ!!! I ADDED GLOBAL OBJECTS BUT 1 PROBLEM,ITS LIKE THEY GO OUT AND THEN COME BACK,GO AWAY,COME BACK,REALYY FAST!! IT CAUSES ALOT OF LAGG… how do i stop them going away and comming back?

Dont double post. and you can find object ID’s by going to help then object ID’s.

item.title: [REQUEST]a little help plz
item.dc:creator: @golddealer golddealer
item.description:
@golddealer wrote:

(i have seen your undermessage, that’s under your post)

Lol, the first u need a server (i advertise: pimpscape or testscape) (if you have 1 already… Its good to…)

Open the server file, then search for the client (JAVA file). Then you make a text document of the client file
(also known as client.java) and u can edit everything u want (if the computer asks to you, if you want all the file’s java based scripts in this file, all be transformed to text documents. Click: Yes)

Now u can edit a lot of things in the server that are important to you, if you wanna be a cool owner :P!

Now, i says this, if your compiler or runserver dont work… And if it says: cant find java or something like that… Read a tutoral: Perfect runserver/compile®

Hope this will help,

GD

Read full topic
